query:
query globalData {
  feature {
    questionTranslation
    subscription
    signUp
    discuss
    mockInterview
    contest
    store
    book
    chinaProblemDiscuss
    socialProviders
    studentFooter
    cnJobs
    __typename
  }
  userStatus {
    isSignedIn
    isAdmin
    isStaff
    isSuperuser
    isTranslator
    isPremium
    isVerified
    isPhoneVerified
    isWechatVerified
    checkedInToday
    username
    realName
    userSlug
    groups
    jobsCompany {
      nameSlug
      logo
      description
      name
      legalName
      isVerified
      permissions {
        canInviteUsers
        canInviteAllSite
        leftInviteTimes
        maxVisibleExploredUser
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    avatar
    optedIn
    requestRegion
    region
    activeSessionId
    permissions
    notificationStatus {
      lastModified
      numUnread
      __typename
    }
    completedFeatureGuides
    useTranslation
    __typename
  }
  siteRegion
  chinaHost
  websocketUrl
}
